results.title: Co-administration of angiotensin II and simvastatin triggers kidney injury upon heme oxygenase-1 deficiency.

results.title: Simvastatin mitigates diabetic nephropathy by upregulating farnesoid X receptor and Nrf2/HO-1 signaling and attenuating oxidative stress and inflammation in rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ effectively ameliorated @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@kidney hypertrophy@@@, body @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@, and @DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue injury and@@@ @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ animals.

results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@renal injury@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ caused significant changes in the oxidant/antioxidant system.

results.title: Statin monotherapy attenuates renal injury in a salt-sensitive hypertension model of renal disease.
results.text_hl: We sought to investigate more closely the anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ and antiproliferative effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIMV@@@) in a model of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and progressive @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@renal disease@@@, as well as its effects on the cyclin-cdk inhibitors @GENE_KRAS @GENE_24525 @@@p21@@@ and @GENE_CDKN1B @GENE_83571 @@@p27@@@.
